name: Reversed (GamersMakeGames)
description:
Made for: Scratch Jam 2021

Theme: -

This game was made for the Scratch Jam 2021. It was made in 5 hours. 

In this game, you have to use Arrow Keys to move the Black and White level around the player. If the black boxes touch the player, you die. If you are unsure how you died, there is always a Replay button, where you can replay the last game you played. 

Important Note - Do NOT press the "View my best run" button. I is bugged and does not work, will only brake the game. To fix simply reload the tab. Also sometimes the buttons need to be pressed more than once. 

Sorry for no sounds
